subject: Baseball
Coaches and Managers
Drunken and Reckless Driving
lead_paragraph: The pitching coach Roger McDowell, accused of antigay slurs and a threat, was put on leave pending an investigation, and pitcher Derek Lowe faces a D.U.I. charge.
snippet: The pitching coach Roger McDowell, accused of antigay slurs and a threat, was put on leave pending an investigation, and pitcher Derek Lowe faces a D.U.I. charge.
